name: Ancient lands: the Tsar awakening
description:
Ancient lands: the Tsar awakening - is a turn-based tactical strategy with card management. Three different inhabitants meet under strange circumstances and now they need to find out the reasons for what is happening and protect their land from the impending danger.
  • Collect a unique deck of each hero.
  • Use the environment for tactical actions.
  • Locations filled with dangers and traps.
Do you have enough strength to resist all adversities in the ancient lands?
